function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased loans in 'other loans' category indicate potential household debt accumulation","Impact":"Risk of financial instability and increased default rates","Mitigation":"Provide financial education and guidance to households, and offer debt management programs","Technologies":"Financial literacy platforms, debt management software","People":"Households, borrowers","Owner":"Financial institutions, regulators"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in loan stock may indicate excessive risk-taking by banks","Impact":"Potential for a financial crisis and economic instability","Mitigation":"Implement stricter lending regulations and risk management practices","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, machine learning algorithms for credit scoring","People":"Banking regulators, risk management teams","Owner":"Banking regulators, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Effective marketing may have led to increased borrowing and debt accumulation","Impact":"Risk of over-leveraging and financial stress for households","Mitigation":"Promote responsible lending practices, conduct thorough affordability assessments","Technologies":"Affordability calculators, financial risk assessment tools","People":"Borrowers, households","Owner":"Financial institutions, consumer protection agencies"}]}
